column5: Bought a couple laser lure 5" swimbait with laser jighead.  Prety gimmicky but it is a good jig head with a big hook and the 5" body looks pretty nice too.  I bet I can catch a laker or two through the ice with these.  I bought them for $2.  Not bad.  Might be a decent pike bait in the spring too.  Dollarama actually had a decent spinning reel for $3. It was rear drag and when I say decent I mean compared to the piece of garbage we had to use for our dollarama tourney a few years ago.  One even had an aluminum spool.
At those prices,CTC new tackle dept. is going down.LOL  Ya Chris,I can see that being a laker killer. Nice find.  Are you out Sunday morning?  PM me if so.
Proven Fact, Laser Light Attracts Fish  that made me laugh. Probably not a bad bait though, wonder if it'll swim straight
Nice Cudz. Yeah keep your eye open at the dollar stores. From time to time you'll get some lure deals. Of all places. Princess Auto is another one, in the surplus section. Keep that in mind.
Ya it's rare for pike to be too fussy, but they do do a number on soft plastics. Did you leave any for the rest of us?
Hey Rob, tthere were only 2 packs left at the south side store on bryne drive. I have not checked the others.  Worth a look.  There are like 4 or 5 other dollaramas in town.

I grabbed those last year from Princess Auto....couldn't turn'em down for $2.  I like the colour and profile of the plastic body....not sure if the light helps or hurts. Did get a real close look from a couple lakers on Simcoe....but I hadn't yet clued into the idea of making them chase so I never closed the deal.
I bought some 8" Storm Lizzards at the dollar store in Orangeville a few years back. Some of my best largies came on those
